user.title: HACS
user.description: Before you can setup HACS you need to acknowledge the following

data.acc_logs: I know how to access Home Assistant logs
data.acc_addons: I know that there are no add-ons in HACS
data.acc_untested: I know that everything inside HACS is custom and untested by Home Assistant
data.acc_disable: I know that if I get issues with Home Assistant I should disable all my custom_components

device.title: HACS
device.description: Open {url} and paste this key `{code}` to authorize HACS, when you have done that click 'submit'

error.auth: Personal Access Token is not correct
error.acc: You need to acknowledge all the statements before continuing

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of HACS is allowed.

common.background_task: Background task running, this page will reload when it's done.
common.check_log_file: Check your log file for more details.

settings.missing_category: You need to select a category
settings.bg_task_custom: Custom repositories are hidden while background tasks is running.

store.name: Name
store.no_repositories_desc1: It seems like you don't have any repositories installed in this section yet.
store.no_repositories_desc2: Click on the + in the bottom corner to add your first!
store.new_repositories_note: You have over 10 new repositories showing here, if you want to clear them all click the 3 dots in the top right corner and dismiss all of them.
store.no_repositories_found_desc1: No installed repositories matching "{searchInput}" found in this section.

repository.lovelace_copy_example: Copy the example to your clipboard
repository.lovelace_instruction: When you add this to your lovelace configuration use this
repository.lovelace_no_js_type: Could not determine the type of this element, check the repository.
repository.note_installed: When installed, this will be located in
repository.note_appdaemon: you still need to add it to your 'apps.yaml' file
repository.note_integration: you still need to add it to your 'configuration.yaml' file
repository.note_plugin: you still need to add it to your lovelace configuration ('ui-lovelace.yaml' or the raw UI config editor)
repository.note_plugin_post_107: you still need to add it to your lovelace configuration ('configuration.yaml' or the resource editor '/config/lovelace/resources')

confirm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete '{item}'?
confirm.uninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall '{item}'?
confirm.continue: Are you sure you want to continue?
confirm.add_to_lovelace: Are you sure you want to add this to your Lovelace resources?
confirm.upgrade_all: This will upgrade all of these repositories, make sure that you have read the release notes for all of them before proceeding.
confirm.bg_task: Action is disabled while background tasks is running.
confirm.delete_installed: '{item}' is installed, you need to uninstall it before you can delete it.
confirm.reload_data: This reloads the data of all repositories HACS knows about, this will take some time to finish.
confirm.home_assistant_is_restarting: Hold on, Home Assistant is now restarting.
confirm.restart_home_assistant: Are you sure you want to restart Home Assistant?
confirm.home_assistant_version_not_correct: You are running Home Assistant version '{haversion}', but this repository requires minimum version '{minversion}' to be installed.

repository_banner.integration_not_loaded: This integration is not loaded in Home Assistant.
repository_banner.plugin_not_loaded: This element is not added to your Lovelace resources.
repository_banner.restart: You need to restart Home Assistant.
repository_banner.config_flow: This integration supports config_flow, that means that you now can go to the integration section of your UI to configure it.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: This is where you find custom integrations (custom_components)

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: This is where you find themes, custom cards and other elements for lovelace

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: This is where you find python_scripts, AppDaemon apps and NetDaemon apps

sections.pending_repository_upgrade: You are running version {installed}, version {available} is available

addon.title: Add-ons
addon.description: There are no addons in HACS, but you can click here to get to the supervisor

dialog_add_repo.title: Add repository
dialog_add_repo.no_match: No repositories found matching your filter
dialog_add_repo.limit: Only the first 100 repositories are shown, use the search to filter what you need

dialog_install.restart: Remember that you need to restart Home Assistant before changes to integrations (custom_components) are applied.

dialog_info.author: Author
dialog_info.no_info: The developer has not provided any more information for this repository

search.installed_new: Search for installed or new repositories

startup.title: HACS is starting up
startup.content: HACS is starting up, during this time some information might be missing or incorrect

has_pending_tasks.title: Background tasks pending
has_pending_tasks.content: Some repositories might not show until this is completed

disabled.title: HACS is disabled
disabled.content: Check your log file for more details

wrong_frontend_loaded.title: Unexpected frontend version
wrong_frontend_loaded.content: You are running version {running} of the HACS frontend, but version {expected} was expected, you should clear your browser cache.

wrong_frontend_installed.title: Unexpected frontend version
wrong_frontend_installed.content: You have {running} of the HACS frontend installed, but version {expected} was expected, if this you see this message Home Assistant was not able to install the new version, try restarting Home Assistant.

resources.title: Not loaded in Lovelace
resources.content: You have {number} Lovelace elements that are not loaded properly in Lovelace.

restart.title: Pending restart
restart.content: You have {number} integrations that requires a restart of Home Assistant, you can do that from the 'Server Controls' section under the configuration part of Home Assistant UI.

setup.title: HACS is setting up
setup.content: HACS is setting up, during this time some information might be missing or incorrect

waiting.title: HACS is waiting
waiting.content: HACS is waiting for Home Assistant to finish startup before starting startup tasks

entry.intro: Updates and important messages will show here if there are any

reload.description: You need to clear your browser cache when changing Lovelace resources.
reload.confirm: Do you want to do that now?
